name: Paladin Carrier
description: Carrier class of AXIS faction. The first Carrier that can be costumize its Support Field through Field generators. It has 1 shield slot, 1 armor slot, 2 special slot and 6 weapon slot for drones or swarms
obtaining: You can obtain its blueprint by attacking AXIS Harvester Cargo in the AXIS sector
tips-builds: Use Fury drones 1 or Hunter swarm 3 in mk1 when farming Pharmakon Blueprints. I advise you to use Speed boost Generators at its support field and a harmonic thruster to boost the fleet speed more. You can also use yellow jacket drone and no support field when use in Umbra Blueprint Farming
author: Tsun-Devil Sonanochi
